meanings.definition: To coat or plate with nickel.
meanings.sent1: She is nickelling the key to make it shiny.
meanings.sent2: The factory is nickelling the metal parts for durability.
meanings.sent3: The robot started nickelling everything in sight, even the plants!
meanings.sent4: His smile was like nickelling the room with brightness.
meanings.sent5: The sun was nickelling the ocean with its golden rays.

meanings.definition: The act of coating or plating with nickel.
meanings.sent1: The nickelling of the jewelry gave it a sleek look.
meanings.sent2: He observed the nickelling of the car parts in the workshop.
meanings.sent3: The nickelling of the statue made it look like a shiny superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the nickelling of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The nickelling of the moonlight on the lake was mesmerizing.
